dcterms:description: The dataset contains data collected from 24 subjects who carried an iPhone 6s in their trousersâ€™ front pocket while performing 6 different activities: walking downstairs, walking upstairs, walking, jogging, sitting, and standing. Data from the tri-axial accelerometer at 50 Hz was used, forming 6630 windows, each with 400 timestamps and 50% overlap.
dcterms:title: MotionSense
